actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the imposition of withholding on certain payments made to vendors by government entities.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Increase Prevention and Reconciliation Act of 2005 requiring federal, state, and local governmental entities to withhold 3% of payments due to vendors providing goods and services to such entities.

titles.title: To repeal the imposition of withholding on certain payments made to vendors by government entities.
